articles.title: Epidemics, Pandemics May Become More Regular. Genome Sequencing is Our Best Tool - News18
articles.description: Given India’s population and COVID-19 case burden, the number of sequences available remains disproportionately low, and insights available from existing efforts need to be sharpened.
articles.content:
What is meant by viral genome and mutations?
The genome of the SARS-CoV-2 virus is composed of Ribonucleic Acid or RNA, a single strand of 30,000 units (called bases) that make up all its genes. As … [+6327 chars]
